description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. This game is inspired by the old Amiga game Gravity Force 2, with a little touch of Worms. There is no single player mode so you will need at least one friend to play it. There are four local multiplayer modes:  1 vs 1 (2 players), 1 vs 1 vs 1 (3 players), 2 vs 2 (four players) and a last man standing mode where you can be a group of players passing the controllers around.
